title: Add dark/light theme toggle system
description: Complete theme system with ThemeContext, useTheme hook, CSS variables, and accessible ThemeToggle component. Includes localStorage persistence and system preference fallback.

title: Add homepage with hero, feature cards, and responsive layout
description: Created HomePage with Hero component, FeatureCard component, header navigation, feature grid, CTA section, and footer. Fully responsive with mobile-first design using Tailwind CSS.

title: Add documentation pages with sidebar navigation and code highlighting
description: Complete documentation page implementation with sidebar navigation, markdown content rendering with code syntax highlighting, and prev/next navigation between sections

title: Add search functionality with SearchBar, SearchResults components
description:
Implements search functionality for the documentation portal including:
- useSearch hook with debounced search logic
- SearchBar component with Ctrl+K shortcut and ESC to close
- SearchResults component with highlighted snippets
- Keyboard navigation (arrow keys) and Enter to select

title: Complete frontend documentation portal implementation
description:
Implements all frontend features:
- Homepage with hero, features grid
- Docs pages with sidebar nav, markdown rendering, prev/next
- Search with Ctrl+K, filtering, highlighted results
- Theme toggle with dark/light mode
- API Reference with collapsible endpoints, copy button

All features tested and build passes.
